Text: IPPSO Conference and Trade ShowIMAGE Ontarios open power market How the key players are players are positioning themselves Our apologies if you receive multiple copies of this message Several lists were combined to ensure complete coverage Ontarios power market is set to open to competition by May of Every consumer trader distributor producer and regulator of power is actively preparing plans to make the most of the new situation Nearly billion worth of annual sales are up for grabs Take advantage of this exceptional lineup of experts to fully compare your options before the best opportunities are spoken for Hear the top business leaders and decisionmakers in the electricity business explain their latest plans and reasoning for engaging themselves in the Ontario electricity market Ontarios Minister of Finance and Deputy Premier Jim Flaherty TransAltas CEO Steve Snyder Ontarios Minister of Energy Jim Wilson Chair of Bruce Power Robin Jeffrey The CEO of Toronto Hydro Courtney Pratt Ontarios Minister of Environment Elizabeth Witmer Senior authorities from the grid operators in Pennsylvania California and Ontario Question dozens of the most relevant authorities in the business on how the Ontario market will evolve in the first phases of development See attached text file for program details or download the full brochure online at conferencehtml Tour the Trade Show and see what the suppliers and most active entrepreneurs in the business will be bringing out next year The Canadian Independent Power Conference and Trade Show is being copresented by the Canadian Electricity Association and in coordination with the Green Power Trade Show ensuring a diverse and lively interchange of perspectives The Ontario Ministry of Environment will be offering a onetime only workshop on their new emission regulations at the same venue Now in our th year the organizers are expecting over delegates and Trade Show exhibitors This is truly the single most effective opportunity to gain a complete and timely perspective on where the market is going and what you can do to make the most of it I have attached the complete Conference program for your review You can register using the form on the last page of the Conference brochure available on our web site conferencehtml print it out and fax back to out office at or by calling our office at Thank you for considering this unique opportunity Please feel free to contact me for further information I hope to meet you at our Conference Sincerely Mike Coughlan Marketing Manager IPPSO conference program as of Oct rtf
